title: 276: Single On Purpose w/ The Angry Therapist aka John Kim
itunes:title: 276: Single On Purpose w/ The Angry Therapist aka John Kim
description:
Today The Broads are joined by The Angry Therapist aka John Kim! They chat about how he got into therapy, life coaching, his unique style of coaching, divorce, getting married young, exploration of self, strong “should’s” from society, “exchanging your truth for membership”, redefining what success looks like, how difficult it is to find yourself if you’ve lost yourself in someone else, making mistakes as a parent, doing life around someone not with someone, and a whole lot more!

JOHN KIM:

***Follow John Kim on Instagram: @theangrytherapist

***TAT LAB: https://www.instagram.com/thetatlab/?hl=en

***Check out his podcast “The Angry Therapist

***Podcast”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-angry-therapist-podcast/id1298703768

***Purchase “Single On Purpose” here: https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/single-on-purpose-john-kim/1136849822

***Find out more at his website: https://www.theangrytherapist.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
